markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Nature's Bounty](/Spells.aspx?ID=435)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 394 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Requirements** You have a free hand.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable appears in your open hand. You choose the specific type of food. A creature can consume the food with an Interact action to regain 3d10+12 Hit Points and be nourished as if it had eaten a meal. If uneaten, the food rots and crumbles to dust after 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The Hit Points restored increase by 6.
name: Nature's Bounty

summary: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable appears in your open hand.
summary_markdown: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable appears in your open hand.
text: Nature's Bounty Source Core Rulebook pg. 394 4.0 Domain Nature Cast Single Action somatic Requirements You have a free hand. --- A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable appears in your open hand. You choose the specific type of food. A creature can consume the food with an Interact action to regain 3d10+12 Hit Points and be nourished as if it had eaten a meal. If uneaten, the food rots and crumbles to dust after 1 minute. --- Heightened (+1) The Hit Points restored increase by 6.
